New| Those 200-OK responses confirm all three endpoints work. a)
Why you still saw occasional “Internal Server Error”
; + When you restart Uvicorn with --reload it spawns a reloader child; if
another instance is already listening you'll briefly get 500/connection
errors until the old one exits.
+ Now that you've killed the stale processes, the clean server is behaving:
— leave that one Uvicorn tab running and send requests from a second tab.
Wrap-up checklist (2 minutes)
1. Stop server (Ctrl +C)
2. Freeze deps (already done but safe to repeat)
bash O) Copy
pip freeze > requirements.txt
3. Commit & push
i bash O) Copy
git add excuse_api.py requirements *vt README.md 6

git commit -m "feat: complete API ~ nerate, top, emergency)"
